pages.privacy: GreenTools India - Your One-Stop Shop for Garden Tools and Equipment | Privacy Policy Home Catalog Why choose us Contact us Privacy Policy Welcome to GreenTools India. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of information we collect, how we use it, and the steps we take to ensure it is protected. 1. Information We Collect We may collect the following types of information: Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, shipping address, and payment details. Non-Personal Information: Browser type, IP address, and browsing behavior on our site. 2. How We Use Your Information The information we collect is used in the following ways: To process and fulfill your orders. To communicate with you about your orders, inquiries, and promotional offers. To improve our website, products, and services. To personalize your shopping experience. 3. Information Sharing and Disclosure We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties except in the following circumstances: When required by law or to comply with legal processes. To trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or serving our users, provided those parties agree to keep this information confidential. 4. Data Security We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. Your information is stored on secure servers and protected by industry-standard encryption technologies. 5. Your Consent By using our site, you consent to our Privacy Policy. 6. Changes to Our Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. 7. Contact Us If you have any questions regarding this Privacy Policy, you can contact us at: Email: greentools@gmail.com Contacts Shop No 1704, Dalmia Vihar, Bijwasan, New Delhi, Delhi, 110061, India +918860934840 greentools@gmail.com Links Home Catalog Why choose us Contact us Policy Privacy policy Terms and Conditions
pages.terms: GreenTools India - Your One-Stop Shop for Garden Tools and Equipment | Terms and Conditions Home Catalog Why choose us Contact us Terms and Conditions Welcome to GreenTools India. By using our website and purchasing our products, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully. 1. General These terms and conditions govern your use of our website and the purchase of our products. By accessing or using our website, you agree to be legally bound by these terms. If you do not agree with any of these terms, please do not use our website. 2. You must not misuse our website by knowingly introducing viruses or other harmful material. 3. Product Information We aim to ensure that the information on our website is accurate and up to date. However, we do not guarantee that the descriptions, prices, or other content available on our website are accurate, complete, reliable, current, or error-free. 4. Orders and Payment All orders are subject to acceptance and availability. Once an order is placed, you will receive an email confirming receipt of your order. Payment must be made in full before dispatch of the products. We accept various forms of payment as detailed on our website. 5. Shipping and Delivery We strive to deliver products promptly. Delivery times may vary based on your location and availability of the products. Any delivery dates provided are estimates only, and we are not liable for any delays in delivery. 6. Returns and Refunds If you are not satisfied with your purchase, you may return the product within a specified period for a refund or exchange, subject to our return policy. The product must be in its original condition and packaging. Please refer to our return policy for more details. 7.
